EmailTemplate.name: 8/6/2013 - Storage webinar.Sorry we missed your mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You: Download Recorded Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’re sorry to have missed you at our webinar, Reduce Storage Infrastructure Costs and Control Your Virtual Environment. We understand things come up, so we recorded the webinar and made it available to you here <http://bit.ly/16RFAia>. Please feel free to contact us with any questions or input into the content. We look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
The VMTurbo Team
